text: “E mwanangu! Chisimu chalakwe (chitendo changalumbana) namuno chili chausito wati mpela lupele lwa mbumbi (tanaposi), ni kuŵa chalakwecho nkati mwa lwala kapena nkati mwa mawunde kapena nkati mwetaka; Allah tachiika nachope. Chisimu Allah ni Jwakumanyilila yakunyilila nnope, Jwaasimanya abali syosope.”
